医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
靶向马可增强癌症免疫疗法的有效性来自莫菲特癌症中心的研究人员通过靶向具有胶原结构或Marco的称为巨噬细胞受体的蛋白质来提高癌症免疫疗法的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/targeting-marco-enhances-cancer-cancer-immunotherapy-effectives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/targeting-marco-enhances-cancer-cancer-immunotherapy-effectime.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffa9d1c0-3d7e-4286-82C8-87887877EF98FE2 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 15:26:37 -0400 Targeting MARCO enhances cancer immunotherapy effectiveness
社会联系在疾病预防实践中起关键作用一项新的研究显示，人们的社会联系在确定他们是否采取预防性健康措施中起着至关重要的作用，这些措施可以帮助减少诸如疟疾等疾病的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/social-connections-play-key-nect--------------in-in-disease-prevention-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/social-connections-play-key-play-key-reole-in-disease-prevention-prevention-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA36DC05-3EA4-476D-476D-AD5D-894B5E2541E2 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 15:11:00 -0400 Social connections play key role in disease prevention practices
已经批准的药物avapritinib在治疗高级神经胶质瘤方面有希望高级神经胶质瘤是一种侵略性的小儿和成人脑癌，鉴于肿瘤位置，复发率以及药物越过血脑屏障的难度，对治疗的挑战是具有挑战性的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/aldread-appraved-drug-drug-avapritinib-shows-promise-promise-in-promise-in-promise-in-promise-high grade-gliomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/Aldree-appraved-drug-drug-avapritinib-shows-promise-promise-in-promise-in-promise-in-promise-high grade-gliomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B6684E14-6964-4D3C-8A7B-1631C95484CB Thu, 13 Mar 2025 14:58:00 -0400 Already approved drug avapritinib shows promise in treating high-grade gliomas
蛋白质被确定为结直肠癌免疫疗法的关键参与者Mayo诊所研究人员的发现可能有助于解释为什么免疫疗法对许多转移性结直肠癌患者没有帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/proteins-isendified-sideified-sy-key-players-in-immmunotherapy-comisistance-for-colororectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/proteins-sideified-sideified-sy-players-players-in-immunotherapy-comisistance-for-colororectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b652949-2736-48d4-a7f9-a7f9-a96787c0f2cd Thu, 13 Mar 2025 14:52:35 -0400 Proteins identified as key players in immunotherapy resistance for colorectal cancer
联合免疫疗法改善了头颈癌的治疗反应进行了针对头颈鳞状细胞癌（HNSCC）患者进行免疫疗法药物临床试验的研究人员发现，与仅接受一种免疫疗法药物的患者相比，患者对两种免疫疗法的组合的反应更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/combination-combination-mmmunotherapy-improves-mproves-wareatment-restment-response-fors-for-head-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/combination-combination-mmmunotherapy-improves-mproves-wareatment-respons-fors-for-head-head-head-neck-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4b67​​96a-7fcd-4192-B81A-A41C6661BD257 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 14:45:52 -0400 Combination immunotherapy improves treatment response for head and neck cancer
便携式系统检测到老年人的轻度认知障碍轻度认知障碍（MCI）可能是阿尔茨海默氏病或​​痴呆症的早期指标，因此识别早期认知问题的人可能会导致干预措施和更好的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/portable-system-detects-mild-cognitive-mild-Impairment-inger--inder--adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/portable-system-detects-mild-cognitive-mild-impairment-inder----------inder-oder-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f7adca-0f38-449f-869c-869c-A18cc631dfae Thu, 13 Mar 2025 14:33:26 -0400 Portable system detects mild cognitive impairment in older adults
麻省理工学院工程师开发有效的方法将皮肤细胞转化为神经元可以通过需要将皮肤细胞诱导成“多能”干细胞的过程来将一种细胞转换为另一种细胞（例如，皮肤细胞为神经元），然后分化为神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/MIT-Engineers-develop-method-method-method-to-convert-to-convert-skin-cells-into-neurons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/MIT-Engineers-develop-method-method-method-to-convert-to-convert-skin-cells-into-neurons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88f93dbf-b8fb-4200-b51f-4e1a1a1fd15471 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 14:26:27 -0400 MIT engineers develop efficient method to convert skin cells into neurons
研究发现了对与颞下颌关节疾病有关的疼痛途径的新见解一项开创性的研究发现了对与颞下颌关节（TMJ）疾病相关的疼痛途径的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-uncovers-new-inew-insights-into-pain-pain-pathways-pathways-pathways-with-with-pormandibomandibarlular-indisorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-uncovers-new-inew-insights-into-pain-pain-pathways-pathways-with-polomandibarmandibarlular-ychoint-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=693096f2-2418-4bc4-4bc4-8fee-c7fc0c0c12b955 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 14:12:51 -0400 Study uncovers new insights into pain pathways linked with temporomandibular joint disorders
